address_sid.description: The SID of the [Address](https://www.twilio.com/docs/usage/api/address) resource that is associated with the AuthorizationDocument resource.

cc_emails.description: The email addresses that the authorization document will be copied to.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

email.description: The email address that the authorization document will be sent to for signing.

links.description: A list of the URLs to the HostedNumberOrder resources that the authorization document will authorize for hosting phone number capabilities on our platform.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the AuthorizationDocument resource.

status.description: The status of the authorization document. Can be: `opened`, `signing`, `signed`, `canceled`, or `failed`.

url.description: The absolute URL of the AuthorizationDocument resource.

account_sid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the DependentOrder resource.

authorization_document_sid.description: The SID of the AuthorizationDocument resource associated with the hosted number order.

capabilities.description: The set of Boolean properties that describes the capabilities that the hosted phone number will have on our platform.

date_created.description: The date and time in GMT when the resource was created specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

date_updated.description: The date and time in GMT when the resource was last updated specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

failure_reason.description: The message that explains why the hosted number order `status` became `action-required`.

friendly_name.description: The string that you assigned to describe the resource.

incoming_phone_number_sid.description: The SID of the IncomingPhoneNumber resource created by the hosted number order.

phone_number.description: The [E.164](https://www.twilio.com/docs/glossary/what-e164) formatted phone number hosted by the hosted number order.

sid.description: The unique string that we created to identify the DependentOrder resource.

status.description: The status of the hosted number order. Can be: `twilio-processing`, `received`, `pending-verification`, `verified`, `pending-loa`, `carrier-processing`, `testing`, `completed`, `failed`, or `action-required`.

verification_attempts.description: The number of attempts made to verify ownership via a call for the hosted phone number.

verification_call_delay.description: The number of seconds to wait before initiating the ownership verification call. Can be a value between 0 and 60, inclusive.

verification_call_extension.description: The numerical extension to dial when making the ownership verification call.

verification_call_sids.description: The Call SIDs that identify the calls placed to verify ownership.

verification_code.description: The digits the user must pass in the ownership verification call.

verification_document_sid.description: The SID of the identity document resource that represents the document used to verify ownership of the number to be hosted.

verification_type.description: The method used to verify ownership of the number to be hosted. Can be: `phone-call` or `phone-bill` and the default is `phone-call`.

last_name.description: The last name of the end user or the business' legal representative as shown on the document.

birth_date.description: The birth date of the end user or the business' legal representative as shown on the document.

nationality.description: The nationality of the end user or the business' legal representative as shown on the document.

vat.description: The tax ID of the end user or the business' legal representative as shown on the document.

title.description: The title of the end user or the business' legal representative as shown on the document.

number.description: The ID number of the end user or the business' legal representative as shown on the document.

expiration_date.description: The date the document expires specified in [ISO 8601](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_8601) format.

academic_degree.description: The academic degree of the end user or the business' legal representative.

profession.description: The profession or occupation of the end user or the business' legal representative as shown on the document.

info.title: Twilio - Numbers
info.description: This is the public Twilio REST API.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the AuthorizationDocument resource to fetch.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the AuthorizationDocument resource to update.

AddressSid.description: The SID of the [Address](https://www.twilio.com/docs/usage/api/address) resource that is associated with the AuthorizationDocument to update.

CcEmails.description: The email addresses that the new authorization document should be copied to. This parameter takes only one email address. To provide more than one email address, repeat this parameter for each address.

Email.description: The email address that the authorization document should be sent to for signing.

HostedNumberOrderSids.description: The HostedNumberOrder SIDs that the authorization document will authorize for hosting phone number capabilities on our platform.

Status.description: The new status of the AuthorizationDocument resource. The user can only update this property to `opened` when authorization document is in `signing`, or to `signing` when the authorization document is `opened`.

delete.description: Delete the AuthorizationDocument and remove any associations with HostedNumberOrders.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the AuthorizationDocument resource to delete.

get.description: Retrieve a list of AuthorizationDocuments belonging to the account initiating the request.

parameters.name: Email
parameters.description: The email address of the AuthorizationDocument resources to read.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The status of the AuthorizationDocument resources to read. Can be: `opened`, `signing`, `signed`, `canceled`, or `failed`.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

post.description: Create an AuthorizationDocument for authorizing the hosting of phone number capabilities on our platform.

AddressSid.description: The SID of the [Address](https://www.twilio.com/docs/usage/api/address) resource that is associated with the AuthorizationDocument resource to update.

ContactPhoneNumber.description: The [E.164](https://www.twilio.com/docs/glossary/what-e164) formatted phone number of the person who will sign the new authorization document.

ContactTitle.description: The formal title of the person who will sign the authorization document. For example, `Mr`, `Product Manager`, or `Marketing Director`.

Email.description: The email address that the new authorization document should be sent to for signing.

HostedNumberOrderSids.description: The HostedNumberOrder SIDs that the new authorization document will authorize for hosting phone number capabilities on our platform.

CcEmails.description: The email addresses that the new authorization document should be copied to. This parameter takes only one email address. To provide more than one email address, repeat this parameter for each address.

get.description: Retrieve a list of HostedNumberOrder resources that belong to the account initiating the request.

parameters.name: SigningDocumentSid
parameters.description: The SID of the AuthorizationDocument resource that refers to the DependentOrder resources to read.

parameters.name: FriendlyName
parameters.description: The string that identifies the DependentOrder resources to read.

parameters.name: IncomingPhoneNumberSid
parameters.description: The SID of the IncomingPhoneNumber resource of the DependentOrder resources to read.

parameters.name: PhoneNumber
parameters.description: The [E.164](https://www.twilio.com/docs/glossary/what-e164) formatted phone numbers of the DependentOrder resources to read.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The status of the DependentOrder resources to read. Can be: `twilio-processing`, `received`, `pending-verification`, `verified`, `pending-loa`, `carrier-processing`, `testing`, `completed`, `failed`, or `action-required`.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

parameters.name: IdentitySid
parameters.description: Show only the Document resources that support the Identity with this SID.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the HostedNumberOrder resource to fetch.

delete.description: Cancel the HostedNumberOrder (only available when the status is in `twilio-processing`, `received`, `pending-verification`, `verified`, and `pending-loa`).

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the HostedNumberOrder resource to delete.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the HostedNumberOrder resource to update.

FriendlyName.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the resource. It can be up to 128 characters long.

Status.description: The new status of the resource. The user can only update this to `pending-verification`.

VerificationCallDelay.description: The number of seconds to wait before initiating the ownership verification call. Can be a value between 0 and 60, inclusive.

VerificationCallExtension.description: The numerical extension to dial when making the ownership verification call.

VerificationDocumentSid.description: The SID of the Identity Document that represents the document for verifying ownership of the number to be hosted. Required when `verification_type` is `phone-bill`.

VerificationType.description: The method used to verify ownership of the number to be hosted. Can be: `phone-call` or `phone-bill` and the default is `phone-call`.

get.description: Retrieve a list of HostedNumberOrders belonging to the account initiating the request.

parameters.name: FriendlyName
parameters.description: The string that identifies the HostedNumberOrder resources to read.

parameters.name: IncomingPhoneNumberSid
parameters.description: The SID of the IncomingPhoneNumber resource created by this HostedNumberOrder.

parameters.name: PhoneNumber
parameters.description: The [E.164](https://www.twilio.com/docs/glossary/what-e164) formatted phone numbers of the HostedNumberOrder resources to read.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: The status of the resources to read. Can be: `twilio-processing`, `received`, `pending-verification`, `verified`, `pending-loa`, `carrier-processing`, `testing`, `completed`, `failed`, or `action-required`.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

post.description: Host a phone number's capability on our platform.

PhoneNumber.description: The [E.164](https://www.twilio.com/docs/glossary/what-e164) formatted phone number hosted by the new hosted number order.  E.164 phone numbers consist of a + followed by the country code and subscriber number without punctuation characters. For example, +14155551234.

SmsCapability.description: Whether the SMS capability will be hosted on our platform. Can be `true` of `false`.

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that will create the resource.

FriendlyName.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the resource. It can be up to 128 characters long.

SmsApplicationSid.description: The SID of the Application we should use to handle SMS messages sent to this number. If a `sms_application_sid` is present, we will ignore all of the SMS URLs and use those set on the application.

SmsFallbackMethod.description: The HTTP method we should use to call the `sms_fallback_url`. Can be: `POST` or `GET` and the default is `POST`.

SmsFallbackUrl.description: The URL we should call if there is a problem calling `sms_url` when the IncomingPhoneNumber receives an SMS message.

SmsMethod.description: The HTTP method we should use to call the `sms_url`. Can be: `POST` or `GET` and the default is `POST`.

SmsUrl.description: The URL we should call using the `sms_method` when the IncomingPhoneNumber receives an SMS message.

StatusCallbackMethod.description: The HTTP method we should use when calling `status_callback_url`.

StatusCallbackUrl.description: The URL we should call using the `status_callback_method` to send status information to your application.

VerificationCallDelay.description: The number of seconds to wait before initiating the ownership verification call. Can be a value between 0 and 60, inclusive.

VerificationCallExtension.description: The numerical extension to dial when making the ownership verification call.

VerificationDocumentSid.description: The SID of the identity document resource that represents the document used to verify ownership of the number to be hosted.

VerificationType.description: The method used to verify ownership of the number to be hosted. Can be: `phone-call` or `phone-bill` and the default is `phone-call`.

FriendlyName.description: A descriptive string that you create to describe the resource. It can be up to 128 characters long.

Type.description: The type of Identity resource to create.

PurchaseIntentIsoCountry.description: The ISO country code of the country.

StatusCallbackUrl.description: The URL we should call using the `status_callback_method` to inform your application of status changes.

StatusCallbackMethod.description: The HTTP method we should use when calling `status_callback_url`.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description: Show only the Identity resources that have this status.

parameters.name: PurchaseIntentIsoCountry
parameters.description: Show only the Identity resources with this ISO country code.

parameters.name: PurchaseIntentNumberType
parameters.description: Show only the Identity resources with this phone number type.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.name: Page
parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.

parameters.name: PageToken
parameters.description: The page token. This is provided by the API.

parameters.name: Sid
parameters.description: The SID of the Identity resource to fetch.

post.description: Create an ProofOfAddress for authorizing the hosting of phone number capabilities on our platform.

parameters.description: The SID of the [Address](https://www.twilio.com/docs/usage/api/address) resource that is associated with the ProofOfAddress resources to read.

parameters.name: IdentitySid

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: How many resources to return in each list page. The default is 50, and the maximum is 1000.

parameters.description: The page index. This value is simply for client state.
